articles.title: Lion DNA convicts poachers in world first
articles.description: Investigators reveal how they were able to identify a missing animal using a database of lions in Zimbabwe.

articles.title: AUS Vs OMA, T20 World Cup 2026: Adam Zampa Shuts Down Claims Australia Undervalue Shortest Format
articles.description: Adam Zampa dismissed suggestions that Australia undervalue T20 cricket after their early World Cup exit, which came following back-to-back losses to Sri Lanka and Zimbabwe despite a nine-wicket win over Oman

articles.title: ‘Good to see’: Jacob Bethell reacts to Australia’s group stage exit at the T20 World Cup
articles.description: Jacob Bethell pokes fun at Australia’s early exit from the 2026 T20 World Cup, stating that they never seemed to get going in the tournament. Australia’s hopes were dashed after back-to-back defeats and a rain-out of Zimbabwe’s match. Meanwhile, England advanced to the Super 8 stage after a rocky start. Bethell and his team will […]
